item.title: Tooltips
item.description: Accessible Tooltips Applicable WCAG 2.1 Success Criteria 1.3.1 Info and Relationships (level A): 2.1.1 Keyboard (level A): 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value (level A): Tooltip As A Label Demo Launch â†— Accessible Tooltip .demo { height: 200px; } [role="tooltip"] { display: none; border: 2px solid black; padding: 10px; border-radius: 5px; width: 40%; } .
